item.description:
Join us for another drum gathering around the new fire pit... (the fire keeps you super warm, but if it's extremely cold or damp, we'll drum inside).

With all of the stresses of the busy holiday season, now is a good time to take part in group drumming. Experience the many benefits, such as stress release, creativity, heightened awareness,, self expression, connection, and JOY! This is a great way to experience the Peace and Love that are meant to be the true meaning of the season.

All levels of experience are welcome, especially those who have never drummed. Nobody is put on the spot to perform. This is a very laid back circle where participants are encouraged to follow their own authentic rhythm. Bring your own drum or percussion,or use one of our extras!
item.name: "Drum for Joy" at The Larches
